content: I'll definitely keep you updated on my progress. I'm actually planning to make the soup this weekend, so I'll let you know how it turns out. Thanks for your help and guidance - I really appreciate it! By the way, I was thinking about my grandma a lot as we were chatting, and I'm glad I got to share some memories of her with you. It's funny, I was just thinking about how much I miss her, and how much I wish I could ask her about her recipe. But talking to you has really helped me feel more connected to her, even though she's no longer with me.
